name: Shin Megami Tensei Persona 3 FES Deluxe Box Set
summary:
Each copy comes with 52-page Color Art Book, Soundtrack CD featuring 18 songs and outer Collector's Box. Engaging Social Link system - build intimate relationships with friends and love interests alike 
Never the same game twice, with over 20 Social Links and a complex storyline encompassing a full school year. Intense, strategic battle system - Find and exploit enemy weaknesses with the help of your allies 
Highly stylized designs with beautiful 2D character portraits, detailed 3D animations, and heart-pounding cut scenes.
